pkgmetadata.longdescription: Boosting Method for High-Dimensional Error-Prone Data // Implementation of the boosting procedure with the simulation and extrapolation approach to address variable selection and estimation for (ultra)high-dimensional data subject to measurement error in predictors. Some relevant references include Chen, L.-P. and Yi, G. Y. (2021) doi:10.1111/biom.13331, Hastie, T., Tibshirani, R. and Friedman, J. (2008, ISBN:978-0387848570), and Yi, G. Y. (2017, ISBN:978-1493966387).
